iterations.yara_rule:
rule Bypass_Sample
{
    meta:
        description = "Evasion bypass rule"
        cape_options = "bp0=$pattern0+0,action0=skip,bp1=$pattern1+0,action1=skip,bp2=$pattern2+0,action2=skip,count=0"

    strings:
        $pattern0 = { 85 C0 0F 84 ?? ?? ?? ?? }  // Test EAX + JE (sandbox check)
        $pattern1 = { 53 FF 15 ?? ?? ?? ?? }     // Push EBX + Call ExitProcess (direct exit)
        $pattern2 = { 50 FF 15 ?? ?? ?? ?? }     // Push EAX + Call CloseHandle (resource check)

    condition:
        any of them
}

new_signature_details.name: antivm_checks_available_memory
new_signature_details.description: Checks available memory

new_signature_details.name: static_pe_pdbpath
new_signature_details.description: The PE file contains a PDB path

new_signature_details.name: antidebug_setunhandledexceptionfilter
new_signature_details.description: SetUnhandledExceptionFilter detected (possible anti-debug)

new_signature_details.name: language_check_registry
new_signature_details.description: Checks system language via registry key (possible geofencing)

new_signature_details.name: antidebug_guardpages
new_signature_details.description: Guard pages use detected - possible anti-debugging.

new_signature_details.name: createtoolhelp32snapshot_module_enumeration
new_signature_details.description: Enumerates the modules from a process (may be used to locate base addresses in process injection)

new_signature_details.name: packer_entropy
new_signature_details.description: The binary likely contains encrypted or compressed data

new_signature_details.name: dropper
new_signature_details.description: Drops a binary and executes it

new_signature_details.name: injection_rwx
new_signature_details.description: Creates RWX memory

new_signature_details.name: persistence_autorun
new_signature_details.description: Installs itself for autorun at Windows startup

new_signature_details.name: procmem_yara
new_signature_details.description: Yara detections observed in process dumps, payloads or dropped files

data.Hit: PID  triggered the Yara rule 'Amadey' with data '['{ 8B D1 B8 FF FF FF 7F D1 EA 2B C2 3B C8 76 07 BB FF FF FF 7F EB 08 8D 04 0A 3B D8 0F 42 D8 }', '{ 8A 04 02 88 04 0F 41 8B 7D FC 8D 42 01 3B CB 7C }']'

new_signature_details.name: deletes_executed_files
new_signature_details.description: Deletes executed files from disk
